title: ReactorTileTemplateSchema
description: Represents the serializable schema for a reactor tile template

ScriptKeys.description: A collection of names of scripts to attach to this object by default

ScriptVars.description:
A collection of key-value pairs of key-value pairs

Each script that has variables needs a scriptName-Value pair, and the value of that entry is a dictionary of
propertyName-Value pairs

ShouldBlockPathfinding.description:
Whether or not this reactor should block monster pathfinding. If this is set to false, monsters and merchants will
be able to step on this reactor.

TemplateKey.description: A unique id specific to this template. Best practice is to match the file name
